data.name: True Bum Simulator
data.detailed_description:
The game about the life story of a bum who is trying to realize an old dream and become the richest bum in this world. This is a True Bum Simulator where you can become anyone from a beggar who fights for life to an influential celebrity who has the whole world in her hands.



In this simulator you have complete freedom of action and a huge number of strategies for passing. For example, you can become a bum blogger, write books, rap, stream or become a crime boss, take over a business, rob a bank, steal cars and kidnap people, or, on the contrary, fight crime and become the head of fbi, investigate and storm criminal shelters. There is an easier option - to become a professional surgeon, actor, priest, builder, office worker, freelancer and a person similar to these professions.

Here you can also develop in the social sphere. Making friends and acquaintances with whom you can go to parties, find a rich husband and give birth to a son.

After you manage to accumulate start-up capital, there is an opportunity to buy some kind of business, such as a restaurant, hotel, game development studio, taxi company, brokerage or construction firm and similar companies. It will also need to hire people to keep this business afloat, lawyers, and bodyguards for pathos.

But this is all just your approximate future, but for now you are a simple bum who is on the verge of death in poverty near dirty empty bottles, boxes and garbage cans.

data.short_description: The game about the life story of a bum who is trying to realize an old dream and become the richest bum in this world. This is a True Bum Simulator where you can become anyone from a beggar who fights for life to an influential celebrity who has the whole world in her hands.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz / AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 770 / AMD GPU Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Pixelated/low-resolution/cartoon violence and comedic amounts of blood. (ie: spraying )
